lead_paragraph: DWORK--Melvin. The family of the late Arthur G. Cohen is saddened by the passing of Melvin Dwork on June 14, 2016 at the age of 94. Mel, a U.S. Navy veteran who served honorably during World War II, brought his sense of style and love of beauty to three generations of our family. Though recognized professionally during his 70 years in the interior design field as one of Architectural Digest's Top 100 interior designers and as a member of the Interior Design Hall of Fame, to Arthur and Karen he was more importantly a dearly-loved, good-hearted friend and welcome presence at family gatherings, while to their adoring daughters, Lauren, Susan, Debra, Rochelle and Kathy, and their nine admiring grandchildren, he was simply "Uncle Mel". We will all miss him. 1/3
